import React,{useState} from 'react' import Nav from '../../../components/layout' import Link from 'next/link' import {useRouter} from 'next/router' import axios from 'axios' const Index = (props)=>{ const [value,setValue] = useState(null) console.log(props) return( <>


Record
  • Blood Pressure: {value && value.bp}
  • Diabetics?: {value && value.diabetics}
  • Smoke?: {value && value.smoke}
  • Drink?: {value && value.drink}
  • Admission?: {value && value.admission}
  • Medication?: {value && value.medication}
  • Kids?: {value && value.kids}
) } export async function getServerSideProps({req,res,query}){ const a = await axios.get(`https://test.ipdb.io/api/v1/assets/?search=${query.tid}`) .then(({data})=>data[0].data.input) return{props:{a}} } export default Index
